about_the_game:
Gold Bundle

8 rare items, 1 stamp, 1 emote, 500 Metanium, 30 Beam Shards, and more!
The Gold Bundle is a great value!
Don't miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

Gold Bundle includes:

● Rare Outfit Set: 8 items of High-Tech suit outfits (head, top, bottom, shoes, gloves, back gear, hoverboard, accessories)
● Stamp: exclusive stamp to the High-Tech suit
● Emote: exclusive emote to the High-Tech suit
● 500 Metanium
● 30 Beam Shards


*Notes
This DLC product is not eligible for duplicate refunds even if you already own its components, so please check before purchasing.
